<script>
    (function (window, document) {
      var regexApp = function () {
        return /MobApp_Android|MobApp_iOS|MobApp_WP/;
      };

      var getUserAgent = function () {
        if (window.getUserAgent) {
          return window.getUserAgent();
        }
        return window.navigator.userAgent;
      };

      var extractAppFromUserAgent = function () {
        var appUserAgent, appVars, index, ua, userAgentParts;
        ua = getUserAgent();
        userAgentParts = ua.split(' ');
        for (index in userAgentParts) {
          appUserAgent = userAgentParts[index];
          if (regexApp().test(appUserAgent)) {
            appVars = appUserAgent.split('/');
            return {
              name: appVars[0].replace('_', ' '),
              version: appVars[1],
              frameworkVersion: appVars[2]
            };
          }
        }
        return null;
      };

      var addGlbOnAppClass = function () {
        var frameworkVersion, nativeAppInfo;
        nativeAppInfo = extractAppFromUserAgent();
        if (nativeAppInfo !== null) {
          if (nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion) {
            frameworkVersion = parseInt(nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion, 10);
            if (frameworkVersion >= 1) {
              document.documentElement.className += ' glb-on-app';
            }
          }
        }
      };

      addGlbOnAppClass(); // Garante que o header irá sumir rápido
    })(window, document);
  </script><header id="header-produto" class='header-navegacao header-editoria header-navegacao-ge' data-analytics="T"><div id="glbbarrawidget"></div><div class="floating-bar"><div       window.RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS = window.RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS || {};
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.autoChangeImages = true;
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.screenWidths = [['desktop', 1065], ['tablet', 768], ['smart_horizontal', 360], ['smart', 0]];
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.thumborUrl = "";
    </script><script>
    (function (window, document) {
      try {
        new CustomEvent("test");
      } catch (e) {
        var CustomEvent = function (event, params) {
          var evt;
          params = params || {
                bubbles: false,
                cancelable: false,
                detail: undefined
              };

          evt = document.createEvent("CustomEvent");
          evt.initCustomEvent(event, params.bubbles, params.cancelable, params.detail);
          return evt;
        };

        CustomEvent.prototype = window.Event.prototype;
        window.CustomEvent = CustomEvent; // expose definition to window
      }

      glb = window.glb || {};
      glb.headerReady = true;
      document.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('glb.headerDom.ready'));
    })(window, document);
  </script><style type="text/css">.regua-navegacao,.regua-navegacao-tab,.has-regua .barra-globocom{display:none}.regua-svg-container{height:0;width:0;position:absolute;left:-999999px}</style><div e.prototype.insertJsOnScriptTag=function(e,n,t){var o;return t&&(n+="\n//# sourceMappingURL="+t),o=document.createTextNode(n),e.appendChild(o)},e.prototype.injectScriptTag=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=a(t),r.src=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectScript=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=a(t),this.insertJsOnScriptTag(r,n,o),f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectLinkTag=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=document.createElement("link"),r.id=t,r.type="text/css",r.rel="stylesheet",r.href=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectStylesheet=function(e,n,t,o){i(n,t,o,null)},e.prototype.defaultHandler=function(e,n,t,o){window["tinyBasketResult"+e]=window["tinyBasketResult"+e]||{},window["tinyBasketResult"+e][t.toString()]=n},e.prototype.getHandler=function(e,n){return"js"===e?n?this.injectScriptTag:this.injectScript:"css"===e?n?this.injectLinkTag:this.injectStylesheet:this.defaultHandler},e.prototype.skipCacheRequestManager=function(e,n){return n.success(e)},e.prototype.getRequestManager=function(e,n){return!n||"js"!==e&&"css"!==e?"jsonp"===e?ajaxCache.getJsonp:ajaxCache.get:this.skipCacheRequestManager},e.prototype.require=function(e,n){var t,o,r,i,s,a,c,l,u,p,g,f,w;if(o=this,e)for(m(e)||(e=[e]),i=0,a=e.length;a>i;i++)l=e[i],w=l.url,f=l.type,u=l.skipCache||n,null==f&&(f=w.split("."),f=f[f.length-1]),r=this.getHandler(f,u),c=this.getRequestManager(f,u),g=l.success||function(){},p=l.sourceMap||"",s=l.id||l.key||"ajax-cache-id-"+Math.round(1e5*Math.random()),"string"==typeof g&&(g=window[g]&&"function"==typeof window[g]?window[g]:function(){}),t=function(e,n,t,r,i){return function(s){n.call(o,e,s,r,i),t(s)}},c(w,d(l,{success:t(f,r,g,s,p)}))},e}(),window.tinyBasket=new r,"undefined"!=typeof n&&n.exports&&(n.exports=window.tinyBasket)},{}]},{},[3]);</script><script>(function(){var n;window.glb=window.glb||{},glb.cdnComponents=glb.cdnComponents||[],glb.cdnComponents.push("menu"),glb.menuReady=!0,n=null!==window.noAutoLoadFN&&window.noAutoLoadFN,n||(glb.fnTimeoutMs=glb.fnTimeoutMs||2e3,null!==glb.fnTimeout&&clearTimeout(glb.fnTimeout),glb.menuReady&&glb.headerReady&&glb.reguaReady?glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig):glb.fnTimeout=setTimeout(function(){return glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig)},glb.fnTimeoutMs))}).call(this);</script>


<!--END content for url: http://sportv.globo.com/servico/sportv/nba/header.html-->



<!-- END SSI fork for esi or beo -->

<!-- End licensee_global_navigation -->

                  <section class='player-index'>
  <div data-ng-controller="CurrentPlayerIndexCtrl">
      <sib-page-header data-sib-title="_page.playerIndex"></sib-page-header>
      <div class="row">
      <div class="col-sm-12">
        <!-- Table Start -->
<div class="sib-table-container sib-table-player-index" data-ng-cloak>
  <div data-ng-hide="history">
    <div class="search-input current hidden-sm">
      <div class="close-btn" data-ng-click="search = ''; changeInitial('A')" data-ng-show="clearBtnShow == true"></div>
      <input type="text" name="player-search" placeholder="{{'playerIndex.searchByName'|i18next}}" data-ng-model="search" autocomplete="off" autocorrect="off" autocapitalize="off" spellcheck="false" data-ng-change="searchPlayers()"/>
    </div>
  </div> 
  <div data-ng-show="history">
    <div class="search-input history show-all-sites hidden-zh hidden-cn hidden-kr hidden-jp">
      <div class="close-btn" data-ng-click="closeBtn()" data-ng-show="clearBtnShow == true"></div>
      <input type="text"  name="player-search" placeholder="{{'historicalPlayerIndex.searchByName'|i18next}}" data-ng-model="search" autocomplete="off" autocorrect="off" autocapitalize="off" spellcheck="false" data-ng-keydown="searchPlayers($event)"/>
    </div>
    <div class="search-button show-all-sites hidden-zh hidden-cn hidden-kr hidden-jp" data-ng-click="searchPlayers()" data-ng-i18next="historicalPlayerIndex.go"></div> 
  </div>

    <div class="title">
      <span data-ng-i18next="playerIndex.title"></span>

                                <li><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/institucional.html" >Mundo do SporTV</a></li>

                                <li><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/noticia/2011/05/sobre-o-sportv.html" >Sobre o SporTV</a></li>
                            
                                
                                <li><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/programas/rio-2016/noticia/2016/02/globosat-realiza-processo-seletivo-para-os-jogos-olimpicos-do-rio.html" >Trabalhe Conosco</a></li>
                            


                        

    
                </ul>
            </div>

         </div>
    </div>
</div>

        
    








    <div class="footer product-color" data-ga-area="footer">
    <div class="row">
        <div class="column columns container" data-ga-marker="links">
            <ul class="first-line">
                <li><a class="logo" href="//www.globo.com/" title="globo.com"><strong>globo.com</strong></a></li>

    </div>

<div class="panelizer-view-mode node node-medium-card node-article node-75735">
        <div class="content-border"><div class="content-border-content"><div class="medium-card clearfix" >
  <div class="medium-card-media accent-after"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><a href="/pt/news/store/sales/promocao-de-cromas-por-ip-de-23/03/17-06/04/17" title="Promoção de Cromas por IP: de 22/03/17 a 06/04/17" class="lol-core-file-formatter"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><div id="file-30546" class="file file-image file-image-png">

</div>
</div></a></div></div>
  <div><div class="medium-card-content white-stone"><div class="medium-card-content-content"><h4><div class="field field-name-field-short-title field-type-text field-label-hidden"><a href="/pt/news/store/sales/promocao-de-cromas-por-ip-de-23/03/17-06/04/17">Cromas por IP: 22/03 - 06/04</a></div></h4><div class="field field-name-field-body-small field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">Cromas para Zed Lâmina do Trovão, Riven Coelhinha de Noxus e muito mais por 2000 IP cada.</div></div><div class="medium-card-content-meta"><hr class="subtle-divider" /><div class="gs-container" id="mini-panel-timeago_category">

  <div class="default-1-2"><div class="all-caps subtle"><div class="field field-name-field-category field-type-taxonomy-term-reference field-label-hidden"><a href="/pt/news/store/sales">Promoções</a></div></div></div>
</div>
</div></div></div>
</div>
</div></div></div>          </div>
      <div class="default-1-3">
              
<div class="panelizer-view-mode node node-medium-card node-article node-76345">
        <div class="content-border"><div class="content-border-content"><div class="medium-card clearfix" >
  <div class="medium-card-media accent-after"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><a href="/pt/news/riot-games/editorial/pergunte-riot-ranqueada-no-aram" title="Pergunte à Riot: Ranqueada no ARAM?" class="lol-core-file-formatter"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><div id="file-35617" class="file file-image file-image-jpeg">
  <img typeof="foaf:Image" src="/sites/default/files/styles/wide_small/public/upload/sion.jpg?itok=VKQcSt1j" width="320" height="180" alt="" title="" />
</div>
</div></a></div></div>
  <div><div class="medium-card-content white-stone"><div class="medium-card-content-content"><h4><div class="field field-name-field-short-title field-type-text field-label-hidden"><a href="/pt/news/riot-games/editorial/pergunte-riot-ranqueada-no-aram">Pergunte à Riot #39</a></div></h4><div class="field field-name-field-body-small field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">Atualizações visuais, considerações sobre ARAM competitivo e bastidores do Pergunte à Riot.</div></div><div class="medium-card-content-meta"><hr class="subtle-divider" /><div class="gs-container" id="mini-panel-timeago_category-1">
  <div class="default-1-2"><div class="all-caps subtle icon-container icon-posted"><span class="time-ago time-ago-node-76345">4 days ago</span></div></div>
  <div class="default-1-2"><div class="all-caps subtle"><div class="field field-name-field-category field-type-taxonomy-term-reference field-label-hidden"><a href="/pt/news/riot-games/editorial">Editorial</a></div></div></div>
</div>
</div></div></div>
</div>
</div></div></div>          </div>
      <div class="default-1-3">
              
<div class="panelizer-view-mode node node-medium-card node-article node-76354">
        <div class="content-border"><div class="content-border-content"><div class="medium-card clearfix" >
  <div class="medium-card-media accent-after"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><a href="/pt/news/champions-skins/creative-spotlight/novidade-historias-e-biografias-de-demacia" title="Novidade: histórias e biografias de Demacia " class="lol-core-file-formatter"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><div id="file-35485" class="file file-image file-image-jpeg">
  <img typeof="foaf:Image" src="/sites/default/files/styles/wide_small/public/upload/demacia-grandplaza-1920x1080.jpg?itok=c2HYCEMj" width="320" height="180" alt="" title="" />
</div>
</div></a></div></div>
  <div><div class="medium-card-content white-stone"><div class="medium-card-content-content"><h4><div class="field field-name-field-short-title field-type-text field-label-hidden"><a href="/pt/news/champions-skins/creative-spotlight/novidade-historias-e-biografias-de-demacia">Novidades sobre Demacia</a></div></h4><div class="field field-name-field-body-small field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">Saiba mais da história e origens de Garen, Lux, Galio, Jarvan, Shyvana, Vayne e Quinn.</div></div><div class="medium-card-content-meta"><hr class="subtle-divider" /><div class="gs-container" id="mini-panel-timeago_category-2">
  <div class="default-1-2"><div class="all-caps subtle icon-container icon-posted"><span class="time-ago time-ago-node-76354">4 days ago</span></div></div>
  <div class="default-1-2"><div class="all-caps subtle"><div class="field field-name-field-category field-type-taxonomy-term-reference field-label-hidden"><a href="/pt/news/champions-skins/creative-spotlight">Destaque Criativo</a></div></div></div>
</div>
</div></div></div>
</div>
</div></div></div>          </div>
      <div class="default-1-3">
              
<div class="panelizer-view-mode node node-medium-card node-article node-76357">
        <div class="content-border"><div class="content-border-content"><div class="medium-card clearfix" >
  <div class="medium-card-media accent-after"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><a href="/pt/news/champions-skins/creative-spotlight/por-demacia-uma-historia-de-garen-e-lux" title="Por Demacia: Uma história de Garen e Lux" class="lol-core-file-formatter"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><div id="file-35604" class="file file-image file-image-jpeg">
  <img typeof="foaf:Image" src="/sites/default/files/styles/wide_small/public/upload/garen-lux-banner.jpg?itok=DJOHio6M" width="320" height="180" alt="" title="" />
</div>
</div></a></div></div>
  <div><div class="medium-card-content white-stone"><div class="medium-card-content-content"><h4><div class="field field-name-field-short-title field-type-text field-label-hidden"><a href="/pt/news/champions-skins/creative-spotlight/por-demacia-uma-historia-de-garen-e-lux">Por Demacia: Garen e Lux</a></div></h4><div class="field field-name-field-body-small field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">Será que os mais valentes habitantes de Demacia trarão a luz a uma cidade infestada de pesadelos?</div></div><div class="medium-card-content-meta"><hr class="subtle-divider" /><div class="gs-container" id="mini-panel-timeago_category-3">
  <div class="default-1-2"><div class="all-caps subtle icon-container icon-posted"><span class="time-ago time-ago-node-76357">4 days ago</span></div></div>
  <div class="default-1-2"><div class="all-caps subtle"><div class="field field-name-field-category field-type-taxonomy-term-reference field-label-hidden"><a href="/pt/news/champions-skins/creative-spotlight">Destaque Criativo</a></div></div></div>

      <div class="default-1-3">
              
<div class="panelizer-view-mode node node-medium-card node-article node-76361">
        <div class="content-border"><div class="content-border-content"><div class="medium-card clearfix" >
  <div class="medium-card-media accent-after"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><a href="/pt/news/champions-skins/creative-spotlight/monstros-uma-historia-sobre-vayne" title="Monstros: uma história sobre Vayne" class="lol-core-file-formatter"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><div id="file-35605" class="file file-image file-image-jpeg">
  <img typeof="foaf:Image" src="/sites/default/files/styles/wide_small/public/upload/vayne-story-banner.jpg?itok=b6C0B-k1" width="320" height="180" alt="" title="" />
</div>
</div></a></div></div>
  <div><div class="medium-card-content white-stone"><div class="medium-card-content-content"><h4><div class="field field-name-field-short-title field-type-text field-label-hidden"><a href="/pt/news/champions-skins/creative-spotlight/monstros-uma-historia-sobre-vayne">Monstros: um conto de Vayne</a></div></h4><div class="field field-name-field-body-small field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">Vingança é um prato melhor servido brutalmente, com muito sangue e dardos perfuradores de crânios.</div></div><div class="medium-card-content-meta"><hr class="subtle-divider" /><div class="gs-container" id="mini-panel-timeago_category-4">
  <div class="default-1-2"><div class="all-caps subtle icon-container icon-posted"><span class="time-ago time-ago-node-76361">4 days ago</span></div></div>
  <div class="default-1-2"><div class="all-caps subtle"><div class="field field-name-field-category field-type-taxonomy-term-reference field-label-hidden"><a href="/pt/news/champions-skins/creative-spotlight">Destaque Criativo</a></div></div></div>

      <div class="default-1-3">
              
<div class="panelizer-view-mode node node-medium-card node-article node-76355">
        <div class="content-border"><div class="content-border-content"><div class="medium-card clearfix" >
  <div class="medium-card-media accent-after"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><a href="/pt/news/champions-skins/creative-spotlight/resgate-seu-icone-de-demacia" title="Resgate seu ícone de Demacia!" class="lol-core-file-formatter"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><div id="file-35606" class="file file-image file-image-jpeg">
  <img typeof="foaf:Image" src="/sites/default/files/styles/wide_small/public/upload/demacia-icon-banner.jpg?itok=Emhjcj6l" width="320" height="180" alt="" title="" />
</div>
</div></a></div></div>
  <div><div class="medium-card-content white-stone"><div class="medium-card-content-content"><h4><div class="field field-name-field-short-title field-type-text field-label-hidden"><a href="/pt/news/champions-skins/creative-spotlight/resgate-seu-icone-de-demacia">Resgate seu ícone de Demacia!</a></div></h4><div class="field field-name-field-body-small field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">Habilite seu ícone e lute por Demacia! Não enrole! O ícone só fica disponível até o dia 6 de abril.</div></div><div class="medium-card-content-meta"><hr class="subtle-divider" /><div class="gs-container" id="mini-panel-timeago_category-5">
  <div class="default-1-2"><div class="all-caps subtle icon-container icon-posted"><span class="time-ago time-ago-node-76355">4 days ago</span></div></div>
  <div class="default-1-2"><div class="all-caps subtle"><div class="field field-name-field-category field-type-taxonomy-term-reference field-label-hidden"><a href="/pt/news/champions-skins/creative-spotlight">Destaque Criativo</a></div></div></div>

<div class="section-wrapper">
  <div class="section-quickbg"></div>
  <div class="section-wrapper-top"></div>
  <div class="section-wrapper-content">
    <div class="section-wrapper-content-wrapper">
      <div class="content-border pager-offset"><h2 class = "black-bar-header">Notícias Mais Recentes</h2><div class="view view-news-recent view-id-news_recent view-display-id-teaser view-dom-id-85546f4dc894986be07bac998adec042">
        
  
  
      
<div class="panelizer-view-mode node node-teaser node-article node-76749">
        <div class="white-stone"><div class="white-stone-content"><div class="gs-container" >
  <div class="default-1-3"><div class="simple-border"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><a href="/pt/news/esports/esports-editorial/tres-lados-contra-parede" title="Três lados contra a parede" class="lol-core-file-formatter"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><div id="file-35827" class="file file-image file-image-jpeg">
  <img typeof="foaf:Image" src="/sites/default/files/styles/wide_small/public/upload/3lados-header-legacy.jpg?itok=b3eRXw8E" width="320" height="180" alt="" title="" />
</div>
</div></a></div></div></div>
  <div class="default-2-3"><h4><a href="/pt/news/esports/esports-editorial/tres-lados-contra-parede">Três lados contra a parede</a></h4><div class="teaser-content"><div class="field field-name-field-body-medium field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">Cada jogador das semifinais tem um propósito e um desafio individual. Uns lutam por reconhecimento, outros pela fama, alguns para se provar para todos, e há quem só queira se sentir parte de algo maior. Esta matéria é o ponto de vista de Takeshi, Ziriguidun e micaO.</div></div><div class="horizontal-group"><div class="horizontal-group-item"><div class="all-caps subtle icon-container icon-posted"><span class="time-ago time-ago-node-76749">1 hour ago</span></div></div><div class="clearfix"></div></div></div>
</div>
</div></div></div>
<div class="panelizer-view-mode node node-teaser node-article node-76703">
        <div class="white-stone"><div class="white-stone-content"><div class="gs-container" >
  <div class="default-1-3"><div class="simple-border"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><a href="/pt/news/esports/esports-editorial/contra-tudo-e-contra-todos-matilha-e-o-youivo" title="Contra tudo e contra todos - a Matilha e o YoUivo" class="lol-core-file-formatter"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><div id="file-35804" class="file file-image file-image-jpeg">
  <img typeof="foaf:Image" src="/sites/default/files/styles/wide_small/public/upload/semi2-header-legacy.jpg?itok=mKO5Bi-U" width="320" height="180" alt="" title="" />
</div>
</div></a></div></div></div>
  <div class="default-2-3"><h4><a href="/pt/news/esports/esports-editorial/contra-tudo-e-contra-todos-matilha-e-o-youivo">Contra tudo e contra todos - a Matilha e o YoUivo</a></h4><div class="teaser-content"><div class="field field-name-field-body-medium field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">A Red surpreendeu a todos com a escalação do Yoda - mais ainda quando ela se manteve para todos os jogos da série. No entanto, a aposta se pagou. O desempenho do Meio foi essencial para que o uivo trancado no peito ecoasse: a Red está em Recife!</div></div><div class="horizontal-group"><div class="horizontal-group-item"><div class="all-caps subtle icon-container icon-posted"><span class="time-ago time-ago-node-76703">1 day ago</span></div></div><div class="clearfix"></div></div></div>
</div>
</div></div></div>
<div class="panelizer-view-mode node node-teaser node-article node-76690">
        <div class="white-stone"><div class="white-stone-content"><div class="gs-container" >
  <div class="default-1-3"><div class="simple-border"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><a href="/pt/news/esports/esports-editorial/keyd-stars-constelacao-que-brilhou-mais-forte" title="Keyd Stars: A constelação que brilhou mais forte" class="lol-core-file-formatter"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><div id="file-35783" class="file file-image file-image-jpeg">
  <img typeof="foaf:Image" src="/sites/default/files/styles/wide_small/public/upload/capa2.jpg?itok=5FGXLlWl" width="320" height="180" alt="" title="" />
</div>
</div></a></div></div></div>
  <div class="default-2-3"><h4><a href="/pt/news/esports/esports-editorial/keyd-stars-constelacao-que-brilhou-mais-forte">Keyd Stars: A constelação que brilhou mais forte</a></h4><div class="teaser-content"><div class="field field-name-field-body-medium field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">Keyd supera todas as dúvidas plantadas ao longo da Fase Regular, anula o favoritismo Intrépido e carimba as passagens para Recife.</div></div><div class="horizontal-group"><div class="horizontal-group-item"><div class="all-caps subtle icon-container icon-posted"><span class="time-ago time-ago-node-76690">1 day ago</span></div></div><div class="clearfix"></div></div></div>
</div>
</div></div></div>
<div class="panelizer-view-mode node node-teaser node-article node-76660">
        <div class="white-stone"><div class="white-stone-content"><div class="gs-container" >
  <div class="default-1-3"><div class="simple-border"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><a href="/pt/news/esports/esports-editorial/analise-das-semis-por-melao" title="Análise das Semis, por Melão" class="lol-core-file-formatter"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><div id="file-35754" class="file file-image file-image-jpeg">
  <img typeof="foaf:Image" src="/sites/default/files/styles/wide_small/public/upload/33360696576_0e83f7dc27_o.jpg?itok=IB28J4eK" width="320" height="180" alt="" title="" />
</div>
</div></a></div></div></div>
  <div class="default-2-3"><h4><a href="/pt/news/esports/esports-editorial/analise-das-semis-por-melao">Análise das Semis, por Melão</a></h4><div class="teaser-content"><div class="field field-name-field-body-medium field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">Nosso gigante analista dá o caminho das pedras dos dois jogões que iniciam a Fase Eliminatória do CBLoL 2017  Primeira Etapa.</div></div><div class="horizontal-group"><div class="horizontal-group-item"><div class="all-caps subtle icon-container icon-posted"><span class="time-ago time-ago-node-76660">3 days ago</span></div></div><div class="clearfix"></div></div></div>
</div>
</div></div></div>
<div class="panelizer-view-mode node node-teaser node-article node-76611">
        <div class="white-stone"><div class="white-stone-content"><div class="gs-container" >
  <div class="default-1-3"><div class="simple-border"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><a href="/pt/news/esports/esports-editorial/nova-onda-de-ingressos-e-calendario-do-msi-2017" title="Nova onda de ingressos e calendário do MSI 2017" class="lol-core-file-formatter"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><div id="file-35748" class="file file-image file-image-jpeg">
  <img typeof="foaf:Image" src="/sites/default/files/styles/wide_small/public/upload/msi-tickets-header.jpg?itok=igjSSNLW" width="320" height="180" alt="" title="" />
</div>
</div></a></div></div></div>
  <div class="default-2-3"><h4><a href="/pt/news/esports/esports-editorial/nova-onda-de-ingressos-e-calendario-do-msi-2017">Nova onda de ingressos e calendário do MSI 2017</a></h4><div class="teaser-content"><div class="field field-name-field-body-medium field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">Ainda temos ingressos para a Fase de Grupos do MSI 2017, no Rio de Janeiro, disponíveis, mas liberaremos uma nova onda junto com o calendário da etapa.</div></div><div class="horizontal-group"><div class="horizontal-group-item"><div class="all-caps subtle icon-container icon-posted"><span class="time-ago time-ago-node-76611">3 days ago</span></div></div><div class="clearfix"></div></div></div>
</div>

<script type="text/psajs" orig_index="15">(function(){window.pagespeed=window.pagespeed||{};var b=window.pagespeed,c=function(){};c.prototype.a=function(){var a=document.getElementsByTagName("pagespeed_iframe");if(0<a.length){for(var a=a[0],f=document.createElement("iframe"),d=0,e=a.attributes,g=e.length;d<g;++d)f.setAttribute(e[d].name,e[d].value);a.parentNode.replaceChild(f,a)}};c.prototype.convertToIframe=c.prototype.a;b.b=function(){b.deferIframe=new c};b.deferIframeInit=b.b;})();
pagespeed.deferIframeInit();</script><pagespeed_iframe src="https://www.facebook.com/plugins/like.php?href=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.facebook.com%2Fportalr7&amp;send=false&amp;layout=button_count&amp;width=103&amp;show_faces=true&amp;action=like&amp;colorscheme=light&amp;font&amp;height=21&amp;locale=pt_BR" scrolling="no" frameborder="0" style="border:none; overflow:hidden; max-width:126px; height:21px;" allowtransparency="true">

</div>
</li>

</div>
<div id="r7ad-bgRight">
<script type="text/psajs" orig_index="20">r7ad.printGAds([204,792],{pos:"bg",context:"right"}).success(function(){r7adv.has_bg=true;});</script>
</div>
<div class="pre-main-content">
<div id="main" class="r7container-8  is-blog-main  is-blog-main is-generic-hotsite  is-blog-main is-generic-hotsite " data-browser-name="chrome">
<div>
</div>
<div id="content_scheme" class="r7container-7 content_scheme">
<div id="heading" class="r7cl7 ref-blog">
<script pagespeed_orig_type="text/javascript" type="text/psajs" orig_index="21">googletag.pubads().addEventListener('slotRenderEnded',function(event){if((event.slot.getTargeting('pos')=="bg")){if(!event.isEmpty){r7adv.has_bg=true;}}});$(function(){postscribe('#r7-skyscraper-sidebar','<script>if ((r7adv.has_bg != true) && r7adv.allowSkyscraper()){ r7ad.printGAds([120, 600],"skyscraper"); }<\/script>');});</script>
<div class="r7-adv-skyscraper scrollable" id="r7-skyscraper-sidebar">
</div>
</div>
<div id="masthead">
<a href="javascript:void(0);" class="masthead-close" id="masthead-close">Fechar anúncio</a>
<script pagespeed_orig_type="text/javascript" type="text/psajs" orig_index="22">r7ad.printGAds([970,250],'masthead').success(function(){'use strict';document.getElementById('masthead').style.display='block';$(document).ready(function(){document.getElementById('masthead-close').style.display='block';var hideCallback=function(){document.getElementById('masthead').style.display='none';};var onMastheadClose=function(e){e.preventDefault();$('#masthead').animate({height:0,opacity:0.4},500,hideCallback);};if($('.box.proximos_programas').length>0){$('.box.proximos_programas').addClass('masthead-true');}
$('.masthead-close').click(onMastheadClose);});});</script>
</div>
<div class="main-content">

  <div class="r7-shareit-holder">
    <div class="image-holder">

      <!-- .is-video -->
      <div class="is-video">

          <li data-social-type="facebook" title="Compartilhe no Facebook" class="r7-icons r7-facebook shareit"></li>

    </a>
